short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is the most amazing Salesforce Chrome Extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GridMate Chrome Extension, where your user grids are literally a click away! 

This feature gives you instant access to a dynamic workspace, directly from your browser, where you can view, edit and update your existing GridMate User Grids, without having to login to your Salesforce org every time!

Accessing and managing your grids has never been easier! Hereâ€™s what you can expect:

 - One-time authentication - just set it and forget it!
 - One-click access to your GridMate User Grids.
 - Update your data without logging into Salesforce.
 - A filter to easily target and find frequently used grids and sub-grids.
 - Your data remains protected and never leaves Salesforce's confines.

GridMate is a suite of lightning components that meet the needs of the Salesforce community by simplifying complex data management with an actionable UI/UX. Watch demo to see how easy building grid, inline editing, mass updates and data exports can be.
